5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Zubair reported:Abdullah b Zubair used to say La ilaha il-Allah at the end of every prayer like the hadith narrated by Ibn Numair and he reported it in the end, and then reported Ibn Zubair saying: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) uttered La ilaha il-Allah at the end of every prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ الذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ وَبَيَان صِفَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to recite statements of remembrance after the prayer, and how that is to be done
